    • Method Detail

      • onPlayerLogin

        public void onPlayerLogin(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerLoginEvent event)
        Handle player login event. Checks whether or not the connecting player is banned in Mjölnir. Kicks with the configured message if so.
        Parameters:
        event - A PlayerLoginEvent passed from the Bukkit server.

      • onPlayerQuit

        public void onPlayerQuit(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerQuitEvent event)
        Handle player quit event. Removes the player from the Mjolnir.why(String) Event cache.
        Parameters:
        event - A PlayerQuitEvent passed from the Bukkit server.
